/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the buildings that line the street. These buildings are adorned with vibrant advertisements and signs, adding a splash of color to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a stark contrast to the urban landscape below. The sun shines brightly, illuminating the scene and casting shadows that add depth to the image.
